text:
Everyone creates insanely realistic videos with Veo 3.

But nobody shows you how. So I did:

There are a few options to test Google Veo 3.

1. Google Vids (the one I used)
→ Go to Google Workspace.
→ Click on Google Vids.
→ Choose Veo 3 model.
→ Type your prompt.
→ Click on generate. 

2. Gemini 
 → Open Gemini. 
 → Tap the “Video” button.
 → Type your prompt, or upload a reference image.

3. Flow
 → Join the Flow wait‑list or sign in with your Pro subs.
 → Click New Project.
→ Generate Clip.

4. Canva 
→ Go to Canva AI.
→ Click “Create a video clip”.
→ Type your prompt.
→ Choose style, framing, and lighting.
→ Hit generate.

You can also test it via Krea AI or Freepik.

To master AI with words (no code) → how-to-prompt.ai
